testsuite.name: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I choose creating new lesson in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then Lesson Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When enter Lesson name "Lesson with groups"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I open the dropdown menu for the current Lesson page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I click the new question group item in the Lesson page dropdown menu
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I switch to the group named "Group"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I click the new question button on the lesson design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I create question "q1" with label "q1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I save & close the lesson on the design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I save and close the assignment summary details
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then the new lesson "Lesson with groups" is visible in its own expanded column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I click on the "Lesson with groups" module in the "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then the module "Lesson with groups" is opened without launch page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I save and quit the lesson
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I navigate to the "Content Repository" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I click "Student Readiness" in the "Lessons & Assignments" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I click "Lesson with groups" in the "Student Readiness" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I see a "Force Grade" button in the "Lesson with groups" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I click the "Force Grade" button in the "Lesson with groups" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I see the "Force Grade" dialog open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I click the "Force Grade" dialog button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I am on the Content Repository page with the "Lesson with groups" column open
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I see a score of "0.0 / 2.0" for the "Lesson with groups" lesson in "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the "Class Grades" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I am on the Class Grades page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I select "Lesson with groups - Lesson" in "Assignments" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I select "Other users with grades" in "List" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I put "qa" in the "User" input box
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I click the Search button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: When I click the grade for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: Then I see the test record details of "Lesson with groups" for user "qa"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I see my total score "0/2.0"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I see the question grade of "Q1" is "0/1.0"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.name: And I see the question grade of "Q2" is "0/1.0"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create lesson with questions in a group
